content.en: MRI Algorithm Optimization: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms to improve the quality of magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) at high field strengths. These algorithms are being developed to address challenges such as inhomogeneity in the radiofrequency (RF) field and magnetic field, as well as to optimize RF shimming and pulse design. By implementing these algorithms, scientists hope to achieve more accurate and efficient MRI scans, particularly at ultra high-field strengths like 7 Tesla and 9.4 Tesla.
content.da: Optimering af MR-algoritmer: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer for at forbedre kvaliteten af magnetisk resonansbilleddannelse (MRI) ved høje feltstyrker. Disse algoritmer udvikles for at tackle udfordringer som inhomogenitet i radiofrekvens (RF) feltet og magnetfeltet, samt for at optimere RF-shimming og pulsdesign. Ved at implementere disse algoritmer håber forskerne at opnå mere præcise og effektive MR-scanninger, især ved ultrahøje feltstyrker som 7 Tesla og 9,4 Tesla.
